name: isotip
description: The javascript tooltip plugin with no dependencies

scripts.test: mkdir tmp; browserify test/index.js > tmp/index.js; gulp test; rm -r tmp
scripts.dist: browserify isotip.js -s isotip | derequire > dist/isotip.js; browserify isotip.js -s isotip | derequire | uglifyjs - > dist/isotip.min.js

author: Mike Engel <mike.engel@datuhealth.com>
